title: When to raise head from Ruku when praying behind an Imam? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: shihab from bangladesh when we are praying behind the imam when shah should one raise his head from rukur so i'm in the record position now if i can sense the imam he's just next to me or in front of me once he is standing erect this is where i stand direct whether he finished saying see him or sense him so i would not move my head or my back until he finishes saying hamidah this is when i start to rise up and allah knows best you
